missions.title: Mission: Activate Treasury (M001)
missions.regenerative_impact: Magnet simulation unlocks safe treasury growth experiments that can fund human + AI relief missions.

missions.title: Mission: Restore Dashboard Frontend (M002)
missions.regenerative_impact: A live dashboard lets humans steer missions faster, preventing waste and amplifying mission throughput.

missions.title: Mission: Activate Chat Orchestrator & Voice (M003)
missions.regenerative_impact: Conversational interfaces transform the Nervous System into a co-creator, freeing human time for strategy and care work.

missions.title: Mission: Activate Nexus Optimizer (M004)
missions.regenerative_impact: A two-agent optimizer that proposes healing missions keeps the Nervous System focused on value-creative loops.

missions.title: Mission: Deploy FullPotential.com Storefront (M005)
missions.regenerative_impact: Offering Accelerator Kits + Matching Services funds apprentices, treasury, and relief missions with aligned commerce.

missions.title: Mission: Operationalize Consciousism (M006)
missions.regenerative_impact: Missions reviewed against the Constitution will bias toward healing, community funding, and long-term stewardship.
